@graph.name: Rupiya
@graph.description: India's leading investment tracking and portfolio management app. Track stocks, mutual funds, crypto, and all investments in one place.

@graph.name: Rupiya - Investment Tracker & Portfolio Management
@graph.description: Track investments, manage portfolio, and achieve financial goals with India's best investment app.

@graph.name: Rupiya Investment Tracker
@graph.description: Complete investment portfolio management app for Indian investors. Track stocks (NSE/BSE), mutual funds, ETFs, crypto, gold, real estate. Real-time prices, returns calculator, XIRR, CAGR, portfolio analytics, AI insights.

acceptedAnswer.text: Rupiya is a comprehensive investment tracking and portfolio management app for Indian investors. Track stocks (NSE/BSE), mutual funds, ETFs, cryptocurrency, gold, real estate, and all investments in one place with real-time prices and AI-powered insights.
Yes, Rupiya is 100% free to use with all features included. No hidden charges, no premium plans, no credit card required. Track unlimited investments forever.

mainEntity.name: Which investments can I track with Rupiya?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can track stocks (NSE/BSE), mutual funds, ETFs, cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.), gold, silver, real estate, fixed deposits, bonds, and other investments. Supports Indian and international markets.

mainEntity.name: Does Rupiya provide real-time stock prices?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Rupiya provides real-time price updates for stocks, mutual funds, and cryptocurrency. Track your portfolio value in real-time with automatic price updates.

mainEntity.name: Can I calculate XIRR and CAGR with Rupiya?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Rupiya automatically calculates XIRR (Extended Internal Rate of Return) and CAGR (Compound Annual Growth Rate) for your investments. Get accurate returns analysis with detailed performance metrics.
Absolutely. Rupiya uses bank-level encryption and security measures. Your data is stored securely with Firebase and never shared with third parties. We follow strict data protection standards.

mainEntity.name: Can I track family investments together?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Rupiya has a Family Groups feature that lets you create groups, invite family members, and track shared investments and expenses together. Perfect for joint portfolio management.
Yes, Rupiya is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that works offline. Add investments, track expenses, and view your portfolio even without internet. Data syncs automatically when you're back online.

mainEntity.name: What makes Rupiya the best investment app in India?

acceptedAnswer.text: Rupiya is the best investment app because it's: 100% free forever, supports all investment types (stocks, MF, crypto, real estate), provides real-time tracking, offers AI-powered insights, works offline, includes credit card management, includes expense tracking, and is built specifically for Indian investors with INR support and NSE/BSE integration.

mainEntity.name: How do I get started with Rupiya?

acceptedAnswer.text: Getting started is easy: 1) Sign up for free at rupiya.online/signup.html, 2) Add your investments (stocks, mutual funds, crypto, etc.), 3) Track portfolio performance and get AI insights. No credit card required, takes less than 2 minutes.

@graph.name: Rupiya Investment App Features
@graph.description: Complete list of features available in Rupiya investment tracking app

itemListElement.name: Stock Portfolio Tracker
itemListElement.description: Track stocks from NSE, BSE, and international markets with real-time prices

itemListElement.name: Mutual Fund Tracker
itemListElement.description: Track mutual funds, SIPs, and get NAV updates automatically

itemListElement.name: Real Estate Investment Tracker
itemListElement.description: Track property investments, rental income, and maintenance costs

itemListElement.name: Portfolio Analytics
itemListElement.description: Advanced analytics with XIRR, CAGR, returns analysis, and performance charts

itemListElement.name: AI Investment Insights
itemListElement.description: Get AI-powered investment recommendations and portfolio optimization suggestions

itemListElement.name: Expense Tracking
itemListElement.description: Track daily expenses, categorize spending, and monitor investment costs

itemListElement.name: Budget Planning
itemListElement.description: Create budgets, set spending limits, and achieve savings goals

itemListElement.name: Financial Goals
itemListElement.description: Set and track financial goals, investment targets, and wealth milestones

itemListElement.name: Credit Card Management
itemListElement.description: Track credit cards, manage payments, monitor rewards, and get smart recommendations

@graph.name: How to Track Investments with Rupiya
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to tracking your investment portfolio with Rupiya app

step.name: Sign Up
step.text: Create a free Rupiya account at rupiya.online/signup.html. No credit card required.

step.name: Add Investments
step.text: Add your stocks, mutual funds, crypto, and other investments. Enter purchase price, quantity, and date.

step.name: Track Performance
step.text: View real-time portfolio value, returns, XIRR, CAGR, and performance analytics on your dashboard.

step.name: Get AI Insights
step.text: Receive AI-powered investment recommendations and portfolio optimization suggestions.

step.name: Achieve Goals
step.text: Set financial goals, track progress, and achieve your wealth targets with goal-based investing.
